name: Average Creation to To Do cycle time
query:
SELECT
AVG(
	(SELECT LAST(end_time) FILTER (
		WHERE (event_name IN ('Change Status to To Do'))))
	-(SELECT FIRST(end_time) FILTER (
		WHERE (event_name IN ('Create Issue'))))
   )
FROM "defaultview-217"
description: Average cycle time between two events of interest to the user
metric_vars: {'end_events': {'id': 'endevents-9', 'name': 'end_events', 'description': "Events defining the end point of the process for the cycle time calculation, for example 'Post Goods Issue'", 'value': "'Change Status to To Do'", '__typename': 'MetricVariable'}, 'start_events': {'id': 'startevents-9', 'name': 'start_events', 'description': "Events defining the starting point of the process for the cycle time calculation, for example 'Create Sales Order Item'", 'value': "'Create Issue'", '__typename': 'MetricVariable'}}
signalFragment:
SELECT AVG(
	(SELECT LAST(end_time) FILTER (
		WHERE (event_name IN (${end_events}))))
	-(SELECT FIRST(end_time) FILTER (
		WHERE (event_name IN (${start_events}))))
   ) FROM THIS_PROCESS
